title: ASUS 24” 1080P Business Monitor (VA24DQFS) - IPS, Frameless, 100Hz, 1ms, Adaptive-Sync, HDMI, DisplayPort, VGA, for Working and Gaming, Ergonomic Design, Blue Light Filter, Flicker Free, 3 yr warranty
description: ASUS VA24DQFS is a 23.8-inch Full HD monitor that features a frameless IPS panel for wide angle viewing to deliver incredibly sharp imagery and stunning video playback. With fast 100Hz refresh rate and Adaptive-Sync technology to eliminate screen tearing and choppy frame rates for the smoother-than-ever experience. Its highly ergonomic design with tilt, swivel, pivot and height adjustments along with TÜV Rheinland-certified Flicker-free and Low Blue Light provides a comfortable viewing experience.
